settings.title: Settings
settings.language.label: Display Language:
settings.data.exportDescription: Export all items, locations, categories, and owners from the currently active provider ({providerName}) into a downloadable .zip file.
settings.data.exportSuccess: Export started successfully. Check your downloads.
settings.data.exportNotSupported: Export is not supported by the current API provider.
settings.data.exportInvalidResponse: Export function did not return a valid file.
settings.data.exportUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during export.
settings.data.importWarning: Warning: Importing data will REPLACE ALL existing data in the currently active provider ({providerName}). This action cannot be undone.
settings.data.importSuccessDefault: Import completed successfully. Data has been replaced.
settings.data.importSuccessRefresh: Import successful! It is recommended to refresh the application or navigate away and back to view the changes.
settings.data.importNotReady: No file selected or import is not supported.
settings.data.importConfirmReplace: WARNING: Importing will replace ALL existing data (items, locations, categories, owners). This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.data.importFailedUnknown: Import failed for an unknown reason.
settings.data.importUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during import.
settings.data.destroyWarning: Warning: This action will permanently delete ALL data (items, locations, categories, owners, images) from the currently active provider ({providerName}). This action CANNOT BE UNDONE.
settings.data.destroyConfirm: EXTREME WARNING: This will permanently delete ALL data (items, locations, categories, owners, images) from the current provider ({providerName}). This action CANNOT BE UNDONE. Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?
settings.data.destroySuccessRefresh: Data destruction successful! It is recommended to refresh the application or navigate away and back to view the changes.
settings.data.destroyNotSupported: Destroy is not supported by the current API provider.
settings.data.destroyFailedUnknown: Data destruction failed for an unknown reason.
settings.data.destroyUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during data destruction.
